message.name: ERR_FV_CASE_MANDATORY
message.locale: A case must be provided for this CREOLE case determination.

message.name: ERR_FV_SNAPSHOT_REASON_MANDATORY
message.locale: A snapshot reason must be provided for this CREOLE case determination.

message.name: ERR_FV_ASSESSMENT_REASON_MANDATORY
message.locale: An assessment reason must be provided for this CREOLE case determination.

message.name: ERR_FV_ASSESSMENT_STATUS_MANDATORY
message.locale: An assessment status must be provided for this CREOLE case determination.

message.name: ERR_FV_TYPE_MANDATORY
message.locale: The determination type must be provided for this CREOLE case determination.

message.name: ERR_FV_TYPE_INVALID
message.locale: The determination type '%1c' is invalid - type '%2c' was expected.

message.name: ERR_FV_EVIDENCE_USED_MANDATORY
message.locale: The type of evidence used must be provided for this CREOLE case determination.

message.name: ERR_FV_CASE_DETERMINATION_DATA_MANDATORY
message.locale: Case determination result data must be provided for this CREOLE case determination.

message.name: ERR_FV_CASE_DETERMINATION_SNAPSHOT_NULL
message.locale: Case determination snapshot cannot be null.

message.name: ERR_CANNOT_SUPERSEDE
message.locale: This CREOLE case determination cannot be superseded as its status is not 'current'.

message.name: INF_CASE_ASSESSMENT_DETERMINATION_DESCRIPTION
message.locale: Decisions last updated on %1z as a result of %2c.

message.name: INF_CASE_APPROVAL_DETERMINATION_DESCRIPTION
message.locale: Decisions last updated on %1z as a result of %2c.

message.name: INF_CASE_MANUAL_CHECK_DETERMINATION_DESCRIPTION
message.locale: Decisions last updated on %1z as a result of %2c with %3c.
